{{title}}

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie } from '../../models/movie'; @Component({ selector: 'items-banner', templateUrl: './items-banner.component.html', styleUrls: ['./items-banner.component.scss'] }) export class ItemsBannerComponent { @Input() items: Movie[] = []; @Input() title: string = ''; }
